page.title: 05LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: THE PLATES ARE THEN SENT TO NEWARK FOR THE PRINT RUN.TO PRINT THE NEWSPAPER TAKES ABOUT THIRTY MINUTES.THE RETFORD TIMES COSTS 16 PENCE AND WE ASKED HOW FAR THIS WENT TOWARDS COVERING THE COST OF THE PRODUCTION OF THE PAPER.THE DEPUTY EDITOR TOLD US THAT THIS COVER PRICE MADE UP ONLY A SMALL PART OF THE PAPER'S COST;THE PAPER IS PAID FOR BY THE ADVERTISEMENTS WHICH ARE PRINTED IN THE NEWSPAPER EACH WEEK.WE ASKED ABOUT THE LETTERS THE PAPER RECEIVED FROM ITS READERS;WHAT WERE THE READERS MOST CONCERNED ABOUT? MOST LETTERS IT SEEMED DEALT WITH ISSUES OF LOCAL CONCERN; PEDESTRIANISATION AND LOCAL SERVICES. CUTS WERE PARTICULARLY POPULAR SUBJECTS FOR THE LETTERS PAGE.
